testsuite.name: about

testcase.name: Structure de la page à propos

failure.message: L'entête existe sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (538ms)
Le menu de navigation existe dans l'entête in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (554ms)
Le menu de navigation a l'id 'nav-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'nav-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (549ms)
Le menu de navigation a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (534ms)
Le menu de navigation contient une liste in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (2502ms)
La liste a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (526ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le menu de navigation doit comporter 3 liens.) - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
L'élément 'main' est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (560ms)
L'élément 'main' a l'id 'main-area' in 500ms - expected "contains 'main-area'" but got: "element could not be located" (546ms)
L'élément 'main' a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (522ms)
Une section est présente sur la page. in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (551ms)
L'élément 'section' a les classes 'flex-column' et 'align-center' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column align-center" but got: "element could not be located" (535ms)
Un titre est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (554ms)
Un paragraphe est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (553ms)
Une liste est présente sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (551ms)
Failed [equal]: (La liste doit contenir 6 raccourcis) - expected "6" but got: "0" (0ms)
Le pied de page existe in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (552ms)
L'élément 'footer' a l'id 'playing-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'playing-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (530ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le pied de page doit contenir 2 noms) - expected "2" but got: "0" (0ms)
